meanings.definition: A succulent plant native to southern Africa, known for its appetite-suppressing properties.
meanings.sent1: The hoodia plant grows in the dry regions of Africa.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe that hoodia can help reduce hunger.
meanings.sent3: The hoodia plant decided to go on a diet to suppress its own appetite.
meanings.sent4: In the desert of weight loss, hoodia stands tall as the ultimate hunger fighter.
meanings.sent5: The image of the hoodia plant, with its appetite-suppressing powers, is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: The extract of the hoodia plant, often used as a weight loss supplement.
meanings.sent1: She purchased a bottle of hoodia extract to aid in her weight loss journey.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes use hoodia as a natural supplement.
meanings.sent3: The hoodia extract whispered to the other supplements, 'Watch out, I'm the secret weapon.'
meanings.sent4: Her determination to lose weight was as strong as the power of hoodia extract.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of hoodia extract in weight loss is undeniable.
